column2: You enter a small stone room there are four doorways at each cardinal direction.
You enter a small stone room, the stench of ogre is unbearable. The only exit is the way you entered.
You enter a small stone room, a villager stands before you. The only exit is the way you entered.
You enter a small stone room, it is empty. The only exit is the way you entered.
You enter a small stone room, it is empty. The only exit is the way you entered.
